# Show regexp can ignore misspelled words.
! gospel -show=false -config=false
stdout 'main.go:3:4: "Speeling" is misspelled in comment'
stdout 'main.go:3:13: "mistaek" is misspelled in comment'
! stderr .

gospel -show=false
! stdout .
! stderr .

-- go.mod --
module dummy
-- main.go --
package main

// Speeling mistaek.
func main() {
}
-- .gospel.conf --
patterns = ["^S.e{2}.{4}$", "sta"]
